# Generated by Magnet v0.5.0

# Do not edit the following since any changes will be overwritten next time the project files are regenerated.
# You can insert custom CMake code at the bottom of this file.

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.20)
project(recursividad)

set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)

if(CMAKE_GENERATOR MATCHES "Unix Makefiles" OR CMAKE_GENERATOR MATCHES Ninja)
	set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/${PROJECT_NAME}/Binaries/${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE})
	set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/${PROJECT_NAME}/Binaries/${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE})
	set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/${PROJECT_NAME}/Binaries/${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE})
else()
	set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/${PROJECT_NAME}/Binaries)
	set(CMAKE_LIBRARY_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/${PROJECT_NAME}/Binaries)
	set(CMAKE_RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/${PROJECT_NAME}/Binaries)
endif()

add_subdirectory(${PROJECT_NAME}/Source)
add_subdirectory(${PROJECT_NAME}/Dependencies)

target_include_directories(recursividad PUBLIC ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/${PROJECT_NAME}/Source)

if(MSVC)
	set_property(DIRECTORY ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} PROPERTY VS_STARTUP_PROJECT recursividad)
endif()


# Insert your own CMake commands after this line.
